login.message: Duya, rayt yu fon nɔmba ɛn di akses token we wi sɛn to yu.
login.loadSurvey: Lod Sɔv we dɛn kin du
login.error: Wi nɔ bin ebul fɔ fɛn di sɔv.

common.preview: Fɔ si di tɛm bifo dis tɛm
common.missingCredentials: Kredɛnshal dɛn we nɔ de fɔ di sɔv.
common.loadingError: Erɔd we dɛn de lod di sɔv.
common.progressSavingSuccess: Yu ansa bin sev fayn fayn wan.
common.progressSavingError: Yu ansa nɔ bin ebul fɔ sev.
common.completed: Wi tɛl una tɛnki fɔ we una dɔn di sɔv.
common.welcome: Di gol fɔ dis sɔv na fɔ no di impak we Sɔshial Inkam gɛt fɔ yu.

ratingChoices.extremelyUnlikely: I nɔ go izi fɔ du am
ratingChoices.unlikely: I nɔ go bi se i go bi

questions.financialSituationTitle: Aw yu kin asɛs yu mɔni biznɛs naw?

financialSituationChoices.difficultyMakingEndsMeet: I nɔ izi fɔ mek yu ebul fɔ liv

questions.employmentStatusTitle: Wetin na di wok we yu de du naw?

employmentStatusChoices.employed: Na wok we dɛn de du
employmentStatusChoices.selfEmployed: Di wan dɛn we de wok fɔ dɛnsɛf

questions.employedTitle: Yu de wok fɔ pas 40 awa insay di wik?
questions.notEmployedTitle: Yu de luk fɔ wok naw?
questions.disabilityTitle: Yu gɛt disabled ɔ sik wae de afɛkt yu possibiliti fɔ gɛt wok ɔr kip yu wok?
questions.hasDependentsTitle: Yu gɛt ɛnibɔdi we de dipen pan yu?
questions.hasDependentsDesc: Pipul dɛn we de dipen pan yu.
questions.nrDependentsTitle: Nɔmba fɔ pipul dɛn we de dipen pan yu.
questions.basicNeedsCoverageTitle: Aw yu go ebul fɔ pe fɔ di tin dɛn we yu nid lɛk it, klos, ɛn say fɔ slip?
questions.expensesCoveredTitle: Aw yu go ebul fɔ pe ɔl yu bil dɛn di rayt tɛm (e.g., yutiliti, lɔn, ɛn ɔda tin dɛn)?
questions.unexpectedExpensesCoveredTitle: Aw yu go ebul fɔ du sɔntin we yu nɔ bin de tink bɔt lɛk fɔ go to dɔktɔ?
questions.ownIncomeTitle: Apat frɔm Sɔshial Inkam, aw yu go ebul fɔ gɛt mɔni fɔ yusɛf?
questions.educationAccessTitle: Aw yu go ebul fɔ lan buk?
questions.savingsTitle: Aw yu go ebul fɔ kip mɔni?
questions.deptTitle: Yu ɔ ɛnibɔdi na yu os gɛt dɛt?
questions.mainDeptPayerTitle: Yu na di men pɔsin we de pe bak di dɛt?
questions.spendingTitle: Tɛl wi wetin na di men kategori dɛm we yu de spɛn yu Sɔshial Inkam pemɛnt pan.

spendingChoices.food: Fɔd (fud fɔ yu ɔ yu os) .
spendingChoices.mobility: Mobiliti (bɔs, shered taksi, poda poda, keke, ...)
spendingChoices.saving: Sev fɔ di fyuchu (sev am na bank akaun ɔ na mi mobayl mɔni akɔn, ...)

questions.spendingRankingTitle: Duya, put di kategori dɛn we yu dɔn pik fɔ spɛnd mɔni frɔm di wan dɛn we impɔtant pas ɔl to di wan dɛn we smɔl pas ɔl.
questions.spendingRankingDesc: Yu kin drɛg ɛn drɔp di kategori dɛn.
questions.plannedAchievementOnboardingTitle: Wetin yu op fɔ ajɔst insay di nɛks 3 ia wit Sɔshial Inkam?
questions.plannedAchievementCheckingTitle: Wetin yu op fɔ ajɔst wit di ɔda Soshal Inkam pemɛnt dɛn we lɛf?
questions.achievementsAchievedTitle: Yu dɔn ebul fɔ du wetin yu bin op fɔ du insay di las tri ia?
questions.achievementsNotAchievedCommentTitle: Wetin dɔn mek yu nɔ ebul fɔ du dis gol?
questions.moreFinanciallySecureTitle: Sɔshial Inkam dɔn mek yu fil se yu gɛt mɔ mɔni?
questions.happierTitle: Sɔshial Inkam dɔn mek yu fil gladi?
questions.notHappierCommentTitle: Yu kin tɛl wi wetin mek?
questions.longEnoughTitle: Yu tink se tri ia we dɛn bin de pe di Sɔshial Inkam bin lɔng fɔ mek dɛn gɛt mɔni?
questions.selfSustainableTitle: Yu go ebul fɔ sɔpɔt yusɛf wit mɔni afta yu Sɔshial Inkam tɛm dɔn dɔn (e.g., pe yu bil dɛn di rayt tɛm, handle wan ɛkspɛns we yu nɔ bin de ɛkspɛkt, ɛn ɔda tin dɛn)?
questions.notSelfSustainableCommentTitle: Ɛnitin de na di program we dɛn go chenj fɔ mek yu chenj izi?
